name: Gardeners tools
description: App has private route and provides separate dashboard for admin and user. Payment system implemented using stripe and user order has protected route.  Admin can add new tools, make new admin, and change customer order status.

name: Super Shop Grocery Stock
description: Employees can manage inventory stock by adding and deleting products. And this route is protected, i.e., employees need to be signed in.Employees can manage their added product by their email id

name: Individual Service Provider
description: This is an independent service provider project made with react i.e., employees need to be signed in.User can purchase any course from checkout route only after signing in.
